strIntroduction: 90分鐘惡魔島遊船，近距離接觸神秘的惡魔島，體驗探索的樂趣！
strTitle: 舊金山經典航線---惡魔島船票

strIntroduction: Visit the shopping centre
strTitle: Cherry Creek Shopping Center

strIntroduction: Cadillac ATS低調奢華，Dodge Grand Caravan穩重大方，Chevrolet Tahoe兩者兼具--乘載您的摯愛！用最自由的態度，暢遊探索佛州風情！
strTitle: 【豪華租車】最高檔，最完整，最安全，自由漫遊浪漫佛羅里達

strIntroduction: 遊覽邁阿密國家沼澤公園，欣賞邁阿密清澈見底的海灘與景色秀麗的風光～
strTitle: 全美最大沼澤公園＆邁阿密市區，深訪自然＆文化一日遊

strIntroduction: 前進大島 (Hawaii Island)！探訪夏威夷火山國家公園 (Hawaiʻi Volcanoes National Park)，一睹活火山豐富的自然樣貌。拜訪夏威夷最熱鬧的希洛歷史小鎮 (Downtown Hilo)，感受最道地的阿囉哈文化！
strTitle: 【夏威夷必去】 大島探險．萬年活火山一日遊

strIntroduction: 遊客必看表演，搖滾呼拉秀（Rock-A-Hula ）是夏威夷最盛大的歌舞秀，草裙舞、火刀舞讓你看得目不暇給。和貓王、麥克傑克森、席琳狄翁一起度過熱鬧瘋狂的夜晚吧！
strTitle: 【超人氣必看表演】搖滾呼拉秀 Rock-A-Hula（提供Buffet晚餐）

strIntroduction: ✌The perfect way to explore Chicago is on a bike！ ✌The options are endless so it really is up to you how you explore the fascinating city.
strTitle: Bike Rental

strIntroduction: 凭纽约探险旅游卡，可以低价游览50个景点、行程和活动！还可以在免费赠送的旅游指南的帮助下，自己设计自己的路线，按自己的节奏游览各景点。这是体验纽约最美的风景的便捷方式！
strTitle: 【自助旅行必备】纽约市探险旅游卡（3、5、7、10 个景点任你选）

strIntroduction: 碧海藍天、海風宜人，馬里亞納群島景色美得令人心曠神怡。天寧島四周有十多處的潛水點，搭船至最遠的潛點也不過三、四十分鐘，相當便捷，來一趟潛水之旅，絕對讓你對這個世界有了重新的認識！
strTitle: 《潛水驚艷》如夢如幻天寧島極致島國風光

strIntroduction: 资质齐备的车辆和司机，合法运营，为客户提供优质的服务 价格公道，不会牺牲服务质量而恶意降价竞争，无隐性消费 司机驾龄时间长，熟悉当地路况，具有优秀的驾驶技术 提供举牌接机服务，可免费等待2小时
strTitle: 【专车接送机】纽约三大机场至市区(中文司兼导 提供热点Wi-Fi)

strIntroduction: When you purchase the Go Los Angeles Card you gain complimentary access to nearly 40 of LA’s top attractions and activities.
strTitle: Go Los Angeles Card
International Spy Museum

strIntroduction: Taste the 'real Chicago' with a comprehensive tour of the city's most popular, essential highlights.
strTitle: Inside Chicago and Pizza Tour

strIntroduction: Delve deep into Houston’s impressive underground tunnel system for the ultimate lowdown on Space City with this fascinating tour.
strTitle: Heart of the Tunnel Walk

strIntroduction: Are you really get to experience what a supercar can do at speeds well above what's legal on any road in the United States!?
strTitle: Exotic Race Cars Las Vegas

strIntroduction: Strip Gun Club is the first and only shooting range located on the world-famous Las Vegas Strip
strTitle: Las Vegas Strip Gun Club - Pistols Package

strIntroduction: Take a tour of the cockpit in the world’s fastest commercial airplane, the mighty Concorde in the Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum.
strTitle: Intrepid Sea, Air and Space Museum

strIntroduction: Based on the hit TV Show, CSI: Crime Scene Investigation. Let's play the role of a crime scene investigator and solve the crime!
strTitle: CSI: The Experience

strIntroduction: 纽约家庭都喜欢的景点、美国的热门目的地！集教育及娱乐为一体，尤其适合家庭游！
strTitle: 美国自然历史博物馆门票

strIntroduction: Discover the amazing beauty and strength of Niagara Falls, starting from an NYC hotel! Get up close by boat or ride an elevator down for an inside view.
strTitle: Niagara Falls Day Trip from New York by Air

strIntroduction: 乘坐直升飛機欣賞大峽谷的景色。降落到大峽穀穀底，在此享用簡易的午餐：蔬菜沙拉，薯條，水果，餅乾和飲料。並將在科羅拉多河上坐船穿越黑峽谷。
strTitle: 【陸海空全包】西峽谷直升機+科羅拉多河漂流之旅

strIntroduction: 夏威夷之心－歐胡島 (Oahu) 環島之旅！搭乘小火車遊覽杜爾 (Dole) 鳳梨園。再到充滿夏威夷風情的哈雷瓦 (Haleiwa) 衝浪小鎮，品嘗知名的彩虹雪花冰。傍晚到歐胡島最美的地方之一的日落沙灘 (Sunset Beach)，在澄黃閃亮的美麗海景陪伴下結束美好一天。
strTitle: 【歐胡島環島之旅】杜爾鳳梨園、哈雷瓦衝浪小鎮、日落沙灘

strIntroduction: Sail the salty waters of Puget Sound and the fresh waters of Lake Union with this spellbinding cruise out of Seattle.
strTitle: Locks Cruise

strIntroduction: 1993年12月25日《Mystère》在金銀島酒店（Treasure Island）的隆重首演，徹底改變了拉斯維加斯娛樂業的面貌，作為第一個太陽劇團的永久劇場，傳奇的起，您不能錯過！
strTitle: 拉斯維加斯神秘秀---MYSTÈRE 太陽劇團神秘之最

strIntroduction: ❤18🈲 成人之夜---今晚尺度無極限 ❤令人臉紅心跳且笑聲不斷的精彩好秀！！
strTitle: 拉斯維加斯臉紅心跳秀---太陽劇團Zumanity解放你的夜生活

strIntroduction: Explore exciting and historic Boston with Hop-On, Hop-Off service stopping at 20 stops throughout Boston--interesting commentary is included

strTitle: Ghosts and Gravestones Tour of Savannah

strIntroduction: The Tanger Outlets offers you the chance to get away.
strTitle: Tanger Outlets Shopping and Houston city Tour

strIntroduction: 凭借灵活的旧金山旅游卡，按照自己的方式游览旧金山。您可以按照自己的节奏来游览景点，同时节约宝贵的旅游资金。还免费游览旧金山著名的景点，享受旧金山的购物和用餐折扣。
strTitle: 旧金山旅游卡（1 /2 /3 /5 /7 天可选 无限游玩）

strIntroduction: Enjoy the essence of Churrascaria in Pampas Brazilian Grille! You can choose to eat at lunch time or dinner time.
strTitle: Pampas - Brazilian Grille Churrascaria in Las Vegas

strIntroduction: Come to Wet ‘n Wild Orlando and discover the USA’s top water park for yourself.
strTitle: Wet 'n Wild

strIntroduction: Swing through the jungle and hang with its furry and flying inhabitants.
strTitle: Jungle Island

strIntroduction: Hang out and dine with Disney’s stars during an unforgettable evening.
strTitle: Chef Mickey’s Fun Time Dinner Buffet

strIntroduction: Immortalize your wedding day with this unforgettable limousine ride through Las Vegas with your very own personal photographer.
strTitle: Photo Tour

strIntroduction: See some of the most romantic sights in New York and a world of cultural diversity
strTitle: 【New York City】Hop-On, Hop-Off Double Decker Uptown Loop Tour (48 Hours)

strIntroduction: 歐胡島 (Oahu) 必玩！世界規模最大的玻里尼西亞文化中心 (Polynesian Cultural Center) 結合太平洋六個不同的玻里尼西亞民族，夏威夷、大溪地、東加、薩摩亞、紐西蘭、斐濟等各聚落的精彩表演，豐富刺激，精采絕倫！想體驗最道地太平洋文化的你，絕對不可錯過！
strTitle: 【歐胡島必玩．體驗道地夏威夷文化】玻里尼西亞文化中心一日遊

strIntroduction: Get to know the Pacific Northwest’s rugged Olympic National Park in this full day trip.
strTitle: Olympic National Park

strIntroduction: Visit famous cities, wonderful national parks and popular theme parks at west coast within 8 days!
strTitle: 【West Coast 8 days】Antelope Canyon＋Horseshoe Bend＋Zion National Park (Depart from LA)

strIntroduction: ♞Take a step back in time to the Middle Ages! Medieval Times is an epic night!
strTitle: Medieval Times Dinner Show

strIntroduction: 没有到过大都会艺术博物馆，纽约之行就不完整！大都会博物馆收藏有5,000多年来将近两百万个作品，贴切的表现了全世界人类的创造力。现在预订免排队门票，省去排队时间！
strTitle: 免排队门票：大都会艺术博物馆

strIntroduction: Prepare to relive one of the most monumental events in the history of the USA.
strTitle: Tea Party Ships and Museum

strIntroduction: Get the best views of the most famous skyline in the world with a fascinating 90-minute Midtown Cruise on the Hudson
strTitle: Midtown cruise in NY

strIntroduction: 連續 19 年被旅遊雜誌評為最佳島嶼的茂宜島 (Maui)，不僅有蔥翠山谷的伊歐山谷州立公園 (Iao Valley State Park)，還能感受昔日捕鯨港拉海納 (Lahaina) 街道上的歷史人文氣息，和 KKday 一起到茂宜放鬆一下吧！
strTitle: 【Tripadvisor 評選全球最佳島嶼】太陽的家．茂宜島一日遊

strTitle: Hard Rock Cafe Orlando

strIntroduction: Set eyes upon the two must-see attractions : ♖the Space Needle and ❀Chihuly Garden!
strTitle: Chihuly Garden and Glass and Space Needle

strIntroduction: Of all the mountains that surround Seattle, Mount Rainier stands boldest.
strTitle: Mt. Rainier National Park

strIntroduction: See behind the scenes and into the scenes of your favorite shows and movies at the world's busiest motion picture and television studio.

strIntroduction: Delve into one of the largest natural history museum in the world：the Field Museum in Chicago！

strIntroduction: Visit Villa Vizcaya in Biscayne Bay and travel back to a world of luxury, elegance and sophistication.

strIntroduction: 棒球迷到美國不能錯過的行程之一，就是看一場精彩熱血的美國大聯盟球賽！趕快下訂門票，到球場為陳偉殷還有他效力的馬林魚隊加油吧！
strTitle: 【為殷仔加油！】芝加哥小熊 V.S. 邁阿密馬林魚球賽門票

strIntroduction: Head out to Stone Mountain Park and discover Georgia’s most popular attraction
strTitle: Stone Mountain Park adventure pass

strIntroduction: 玻里尼西亞魔術秀 (Magic of Polynesia) 在 2000 年得到了有魔術界奧斯卡之稱的魔術原創大獎，完美地融合了魔術表演、聲光藝術、玻里尼西亞舞蹈和歌曲表演。打算到夏威夷歐胡島 (Oahu) 的你，一定要前往觀看！
strTitle: 【魔術界奧斯卡】玻里尼西亞幻象魔術秀門票（可加購晚餐）

strIntroduction: ♛Experience the stunning 360 degree panoramic views from 360 Chicago ♛ No other tower gets you closer to the heart of Chicago
strTitle: 360 Chicago

strIntroduction: Have a wild day out at the San Diego Zoo!
strTitle: San Diego Zoo

strIntroduction: Its New York magic at its best - to glide gracefully across the ice under a star-encrusted sky！
strTitle: Central Park Ice Skating at Wollman Park Rink

strIntroduction: Explore the fascinating places next to Mexico! In this artistic tour, you have a 1 day tour taking you through Xochimilco and Coyoacán, and fall into love with the magical masterpiece of Frida Kahlo.
strTitle: Non-Refundable Offer: Xochimilco Frida Kahlo

strIntroduction: For the natural adventurers and thrill seekers amongst you, if you are an experienced, certified scuba diver enjoying the surf and sand in the Cancun region, join us for a remarkable dive in the waters off Cozumel, with the area's most renowned dive centre.
strTitle: Scuba diving with transport

strIntroduction: Mexico city is the capital of a football mad country with Estadio azteca being one stadium that every football fan in the world is aware of. You will also visit the South of the city, and explore lots of important iconic buildings.
strTitle: Visit the Azteca soccer stadium and the south of the city

strIntroduction: Know the best places in the City aboard our latest generation buses with a retractable roof. Get off and on the bus whenever you want throughout your journey on any of our tours. Discover the best museums, restaurants and shopping centres.
strTitle: Hop On - Hop Off Capital Bus

strIntroduction: Discover the majesty of Mexico City with this fascinating full day tour that takes in the top sights and attractions of this vast metropolis.
strTitle: Mexico City Tour

strIntroduction: Discover the story and art behind two of the most emblematic Mexican painters: Frida Kahlo and Diego Rivera. Visit the ‘Blue House’ museum, Frida Kahlo’s home, and the Diego Rivera Studio museum which both exhibit works of art and collections by husband and wife duo on this morning tour full of culture and crafts.
strTitle: The Blue House, Diego Rivera's museum and shopping

strIntroduction: Enjoy a spectacular day out on the Caribbean. Have fun and sail with us in a Catamaran from Cancun and the Riviera Maya to Isla Mujeres.
strTitle: Isla Mujeres in Catamaran

strIntroduction: Join us on a full day tour around Mexico City that shows you the best this city has to offer. Visit the Unesco World Heritage historical centre, the popular Coyoacan neighbourhood and take a boat ride aboard a colourful trajinera around the canals of Xochimilco.
strTitle: City Tour and Xochimilco Visit

strIntroduction: Visit two of the hidden gems of Mexico in this scenic bus tour: Cuernavaca, City of Eternal Spring, located just 80 km from Mexico City; and Taxco, a Spanish colonial city dedicated to mining silver.
strTitle: Pack Taxco & Cuernavaca and Ciudad Univer & Xochimilco

strIntroduction: One of the most picturesque archaeological sites in the Riviera Maya and the only one to have been built overlooking the ocean. Tulum offers a spectacular view of the Riviera Maya beaches, Caribbean Sea and surrounding coastal region.
strTitle: Tulum at Sunrise with Expert Guide in Archeology

strIntroduction: Come join us for a unique spin on the old dinner and a movie date night, with a night out to remember in Mexico City!
strTitle: Dinner at Bellini Revolving Restaurant and Garibaldi Show

strIntroduction: 無限上網吃到飽，暢遊北美三國，再加贈無限撥打美國、加拿大、墨西哥、夏威夷之市話手機
strTitle: 【美加墨通用】30天4G網卡吃到飽（贈送無限通話）

strIntroduction: 途風和加拿大多倫多歷史最悠久的巴士地接公司強強合作！ 在三天的行程中您將暢遊加拿大的名城蒙特利爾與魁北克，還將來到千島湖景區，感受加拿大三大自然奇景之千島風情。
strTitle: 【魅力千島風情】東加拿大、多倫多、魁北克、千島湖唯美三日行

strIntroduction: 身處在21世紀的你能忍受沒有網路的生活嗎？！ 難道到了國外只能變回摩登原始人或是成為遊牧民族的到處找 wifi 熱點嗎？沒關係，快到 kkday，高品質上網分享器，給您在國外網路也能暢通無阻的體驗！此外，此機型還可讓您暢遊美加不受限！
strTitle: 【北美前三大電信業者共同加持】美加 WiFi 分享器租借服務（可美加跨區無流量限制）
